participant_1.name: Riley
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and independent, loves the thrill of speed and the freedom of the open road. Friendly and sociable, with a passion for life.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i have light skin with big brown eyes. my main transportation is my motorbike.

participant_2.name: Ashley
participant_2.personality: Confident and glamorous, enjoys the finer things in life and isn't afraid to express herself. She has a vibrant personality and loves to be the center of attention.
participant_2.background: i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i diet a lot.

content.text: that's cool , i am a redhead , i wear a lot of red
